title: The Kawhi Decision Will Change Everything for an Already Changed NBA | The Mismatch
description:
Kawhi Leonard seems destined to wind up with the Los Angeles Lakers, but whatever he decides to do will drastically shift the NBA landscape (0:36). The top Eastern Conference contenders reload for another run (16:59) while a handful of teams make some questionable signings (42:44).
Hosts: Chris Vernon, Kevin O’Connor

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
